title: Whoa: Nordstrom's Holiday Sale Is Off the Charts Good—32 Sweaters, Jeans, and Boots Worth Adding to Your Winter Wardrobe
description: Whoa: Nordstrom's Holiday Sale Is Off the Charts Good—32 Sweaters, Jeans, and Boots Worth Adding to Your Winter Wardrobe
excerpt: We're sharing the chicest sweaters, jeans, and boots worth adding to your winter wardrobe from Nordstrom's Holiday Sale.
text: I love a good sale, and nothing beats the variety and major discounts to be had during Nordstrom’s epic holiday sale, taking place right now thought January 6. Whether you’re keen to stock up on staple sweaters or invest in a chic pair of versatile boots, there are a huge variety of chic styles that are up to 60% off.Of course, I’ve already ransacked through hundreds of pages of sale products—to save you the time and energy—and below I’m sharing my edit of chic and versatile sweaters, jeans, and boots—the trusty essentials in our wardrobes! These will see you through the winter and beyond in utmost style.Sweaters Nordstrom Relaxed Cashmere Crewneck Sweater Perfect for your winter white look. Nordstrom Crewneck Cashmere Sweater A charcoal gray crewneck always looks so chic. Nordstrom Cashmere Turtleneck Sweater Olive green hues are trending. Nordstrom Wool & Cashmere Turtleneck Sweater When you want to be cozy and look chic. Nordstrom Cashmere V-Neck Sweater A relaxed navy sweater oozes French-girl vibes. Topshop Cable Stitch Cardigan A cute cardi at such a great price. Madewell Ribbed Cotton Blend Sweater Love how effortless this looks. vineyard vines Bow Back Merino Wool Blend Sweater Treasure & Bond Oversize V-Neck Sweater Don't underestimate the power of a cozy black V-neck. Alex Mill Paris Stripe Cotton & Cashmere Cardigan A striped knit is always a good idea. Caslon Wool & Cashmere Cardigan Throw on over your tank tops or turtlenecks. BP. Quarter Zip Cotton Blend Rib Sweater Ideal for layering over thin turtlenecks and under wool coats. BP. Oversize Fair Isle Crewneck Sweater It's Fair Isle sweater season—and this one is such a great price. Jeans Levi's Ribcage High Waist Straight Leg Jeans The Levi's our editors love. PAIGE Sasha Seamed Pocket High Waist Wide Leg Jeans Denim that looks polished and elevated. STAUD + Wrangler The Loose Fit Jeans PAIGE Sawyer High Waist Straight Leg Jeans I'm a big fan of these straight-leg jeans. Joe's The Dani Michelle Ryan Low Slung Baggy Jeans The fashion set love them low and loose. Madewell Tapered Denim Trousers Style with an ivory sweater and black accessories for a rich-looking winter outfit. Veronica Beard Taylor High Waist Wide Leg Jeans The perfect high-waisted wide-leg jeans. NYDJ Jemma High Waist Barrel Leg Jeans Wear with flats and heels alike. PAIGE Sasha High Waist Wide Leg Jeans Add a black belt and sleek turtleneck and you're good to go. Favorite Daughter The Ollie Ultimate Baggy High Waist Wide Leg Jeans Boots Nordstrom Arazio Kitten Heel Bootie The perfect kitten heel black boots for under $90! UGG® Classic Ultra Mini Alpsey Boot Run, don't walk when Ugg's are on sale. Valentino Garavani Vlogo Locker Bootie If you're seeking a designer pair, then look no further. Style with your midi and maxi dresses this winter. Bernardo Footwear Tanner Knee High Riding Boot Blondo Natasia Faux Shearling Cuff Waterproof Boot Aquazzura Sellier Knee High Boot
html:
I love a good sale, and nothing beats the variety and major discounts to be had during Nordstrom’s epic holiday sale, taking place right now thought January 6. Whether you’re keen to stock up on staple sweaters or invest in a chic pair of versatile boots, there are a huge variety of chic styles that are up to 60% off.

Of course, I’ve already ransacked through hundreds of pages of sale products—to save you the time and energy—and below I’m sharing my edit of chic and versatile sweaters, jeans, and boots—the trusty essentials in our wardrobes! These will see you through the winter and beyond in utmost style.

Sweaters

Nordstrom

Relaxed Cashmere Crewneck Sweater

Perfect for your winter white look.

Nordstrom

Crewneck Cashmere Sweater

A charcoal gray crewneck always looks so chic.

Nordstrom

Cashmere Turtleneck Sweater

Olive green hues are trending.

Nordstrom

Wool & Cashmere Turtleneck Sweater

When you want to be cozy and look chic.

Nordstrom

Cashmere V-Neck Sweater

A relaxed navy sweater oozes French-girl vibes.

Topshop

Cable Stitch Cardigan

A cute cardi at such a great price.

Madewell

Ribbed Cotton Blend Sweater

Love how effortless this looks.

vineyard vines

Bow Back Merino Wool Blend Sweater

Treasure & Bond

Oversize V-Neck Sweater

Don't underestimate the power of a cozy black V-neck.

Alex Mill

Paris Stripe Cotton & Cashmere Cardigan

A striped knit is always a good idea.

Caslon

Wool & Cashmere Cardigan

Throw on over your tank tops or turtlenecks.

BP.

Quarter Zip Cotton Blend Rib Sweater

Ideal for layering over thin turtlenecks and under wool coats.

BP.

Oversize Fair Isle Crewneck Sweater

It's Fair Isle sweater season—and this one is such a great price.

Levi's

Ribcage High Waist Straight Leg Jeans

The Levi's our editors love.

Sasha Seamed Pocket High Waist Wide Leg Jeans

Denim that looks polished and elevated.

STAUD + Wrangler

The Loose Fit Jeans

Sawyer High Waist Straight Leg Jeans

I'm a big fan of these straight-leg jeans.

The Dani Michelle Ryan Low Slung Baggy Jeans

The fashion set love them low and loose.

Madewell

Tapered Denim Trousers

Style with an ivory sweater and black accessories for a rich-looking winter outfit.

Veronica Beard

Taylor High Waist Wide Leg Jeans

The perfect high-waisted wide-leg jeans.

NYDJ

Jemma High Waist Barrel Leg Jeans

Wear with flats and heels alike.

PAIGE

Sasha High Waist Wide Leg Jeans

Add a black belt and sleek turtleneck and you're good to go.

Favorite Daughter

The Ollie Ultimate Baggy High Waist Wide Leg Jeans

Boots

Nordstrom

Arazio Kitten Heel Bootie

The perfect kitten heel black boots for under $90!

Run, don't walk when Ugg's are on sale.

If you're seeking a designer pair, then look no further.
